about_the_game:
Can you imagine a different word where you can build your own history? I can imagine it too, but I go a little more, I am developing this world. A game where you can really build your own history inside that narrative universe game through of your choices and actions that what will influence in your reputation and popularity.
In this world you are free to make your history. Did it looks like the other games you had ever seen? Just looks like, because I guarantee to you this universe go much over of his BETA first version.

The Legendary Player – Make Your Reputation is a game in his Alpha stage, it was a Graduation Work project of Kauã Rajah Rocha Krobel (Founder of Ninetales Studios) for his Digital Games and Entertainment Design course offered by Vale do Itajai University – Campus Balneario Camboriu.

This game is about giving to the player a freedom of himself to create your history and it’s for this reason what it was available in BETA through Early Access, so buy it, download it and…
Make your legend, do your own history and LIVE YOUR ADVENTURE!

With your experience in this narrative universe, join the developing community to build a biggest universe to this game!

The current features of the game are:
mobs:
Spider
Slime
Cabbage

Character Genders:
Man
Woman

Visual resources:
Particles and Effects
Clothing
Animations
Tile-sets

Sound Resources:
Sound effects

Programming Resources and Artificial Intelligence:
System Reputation and Popularity
Damage Logic
Player Level Experience Analysis System
Month, Day and Year Cycle

Other features:
Interfaces
Maps
Save / Load

highlighted.name: Starting the story of the myth
Perfect elimination of the damn walking cabbages lvl 1

detailed_description:
Update Notes

We removed the English language to speed up game development.
The next game updates will not have text or interfaces in English. In addition to the fact that the texts have not been subject to textual revisions


Just Updated

The update Demo 0.2.7 has already been applied and is available for download.

Meanwhile, we are finishing the last adjustments of the Update Beta 0.2.8 that will be available still on this Friday 22/12. Sorry for the delay, but as stated in the update notes, we had a problem that did not let the game run on Steam.


Update Notes

Before presenting the update notes, Ninetales Studios informs that the updates are having problems running on Steam. And so they will not be applied until the problem is resolved. This problem has arisen from the last update of the Steam client and also from the SDK offered so that the game can be published on the platform.

These updates were to be implemented on 11/18/2017 and will be implemented as soon as the problem is fixed.
We're sorry for the inconvenience.

Release Notes Beta 0.2.8

~ Applying Updates Demo 0.2.7
-Quest from the Harvest of Apples made available in Alpha 0.1.2 reintroduced in BETA
-New NPCs
-***New Achievement
-New Map (Removed)
-New Hunting Quest (Removed)

-------------------------------
Update Notes Demo 0.2.7

-New Move Instructions Screen
-New Interaction Instructions Screen
-New Attack Screen Attacks
-New HUD Instruction Screen with Survival Guide
-New Statistics Screen
-New interaction indicator balloon
-New Indicator of interactions


Early Beta Access

Hello everyone, I would like to apologize to all of you at the time of making the adjustments to the Early Access release, I ended up launching the game as a "final version" (This problem has already been fixed)

And as a way to redeem myself, I'm planning to do some things to reward shoppers whether they bought me for my failure if they still wish to stay with the Early Access game.

1st At the end of the Beta I will draw 100 kits (I would draw 10 kits) but I increased because I failed with you, these kits are collectors, all buyers of the game will participate in the draw. What are you getting in these kits? Good ... I think of items and plush characters from the game that will come in later, and other things that you and I can discuss, what do you think? The value of these kits will be $ 500. Okay ... I'm offering $ 50,000 in kits + freight depending on where you are, all for free.

Another idea is to stream development, where I will interact with everyone who is watching, you will give me ideas of what for in the game and also follow me implementing.

I am also willing to listen to you, what else can I do to reward you for my failure?


Early Beta Access

*****OPEN BETA version with new face, but it’s the same concept*****

Consumer Rewards Beta:
1) BETA buyer insignia
2) Game
3) Participation of Developing Forum

Rewards of Participation of the Developing Community:
1) BETA-Tester Insignia (for players who play in one more BETA version)
2) Bug Reporter Insignia (for players who reported bugs, errors and problems in the game)
3) QA Insignia (for players who help in the Quality Control)
4) Content Creator Insignia (for players who give ideas that are approved and implemented in the game)

***BETA version News***
-------------------- Beta 1.00.00 --------------------
1) New character creater system
2) New starting Menu
3) New Credits screen
4) New introduction
5) New tutorial
6) New maps
7) New mecanics
8) New class selector system
9) New progression system
10) New Artificial Intelligence (AI)
11) Update player’s level experience analisys system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32 bits
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Imagine a world where you can create your own legend. The Legendary Player – Make Your Reputation it’s a 2D RPG Top-Side Down with reputation building system who allows the player build his own history.
